page.title: 15Kimbolton-Manufacturing etc.
page.content: The character of the village attracts enterprising families.{Kimbolton {Fireworks}manufactures and exhibits a wide range of fireworks,and mounted the large-scale display in London to celebrate the Queen's Silver Jubilee.{ {Peter Roe Furniture}uses reclaimed and seasoned timber for fitting pine kitchens etc.and shares premises with a picture-framer.{Peter Ralph {Industrial Designs}plans the layout of almost anything,from the cabin of a JCB to the cockpit of an aircraft.These work within the village,while a small industrial complex operates on the edge of the former USAF airfield.The six units include light engineering,electronics manufacture and industrial floor-laying.These companies only employ 2 or 3 at most and further expansion is needed to keep youngsters
